entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
